lead_paragraph: Burnley have again broken their transfer record, to sign Ireland midfielder Jeff Hendrick from second-tier Derby County on a three-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Burnley Sign Hendrick From Derby for Another Club-Record Fee
headline.main: Burnley Sign Hendrick From Derby for Another Club-Record Fee

snippet: Burnley have again broken their transfer record, to sign Ireland midfielder Jeff Hendrick from second-tier Derby County on a three-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....
